body_html:
@drpngx changing Attr("dtypes: list(int)") to Attr("dtypes: list(type)") works, but I don't know why.
The "Adding new op" page said that:

list(<type>): A list of <type>, where <type> is one of the above types. Note that list(list(<type>)) is invalid.
list(int) should work, if not, the official document is wrong.
body_text:
@drpngx changing Attr("dtypes: list(int)") to Attr("dtypes: list(type)") works, but I don't know why.
The "Adding new op" page said that:
list(<type>): A list of <type>, where <type> is one of the above types. Note that list(list(<type>)) is invalid.
list(int) should work, if not, the official document is wrong.
body:
@drpngx changing Attr("dtypes: list(int)") to Attr("dtypes: list(type)") works, but I don't know why.
The "Adding new op" page said that:

`list(<type>): A list of <type>, where <type> is one of the above types. Note that list(list(<type>)) is invalid.`
list(int) should work, if not, the official document is wrong.
